p: Silicones are included in cosmetic formulations such as hair conditioners and shampoos to give hair a silky appearance and shine, as well as in facial creams to protect and improve the skinâ€™s strength and elasticity [ 134, 136]. Silicone products applied to the skin impart a pleasant smoothing sensation. Silicone elastomeric particles can absorb various liquids, including emollients and sebum, and can thus be used as an agent to carry active ingredients to the skin or to control sebum deposition in the skin [ 136, 142].
